Landslide Maven plugin
Last Published: 2013-06-03  | Version: 0.2-SNAPSHOT
Landslide Maven plugin
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

landslide:landslide

Full name:

com.github.rmannibucau:landslide-maven-plugin:0.2-SNAPSHOT:landslide

Description:

(no description)

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: pre-site.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
source File - (no description)
User property is: landslide.source.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
copyTheme boolean - (no description)
Default value is: false.
User property is: landslide.copy-theme.
debug boolean - (no description)
Default value is: false.
User property is: landslide.debug.
destination File - (no description)
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/landslide/presentation.html.
User property is: landslide.destination.
embed boolean - (no description)
Default value is: false.
User property is: landslide.embed.
encoding String - (no description)
User property is: landslide.encoding.
extensions String - (no description)
lineos String - (no description)
User property is: landslide.lineos.
presenterMode boolean - (no description)
Default value is: false.
User property is: landslide.presenter-mode.
quiet boolean - (no description)
Default value is: false.
User property is: landslide.quiet.
relative boolean - (no description)
Default value is: false.
User property is: landslide.relative.
theme File - (no description)
User property is: landslide.theme.
watch int - (no description)
Default value is: -1.
User property is: landslide.watch.

Parameter Details

copyTheme:

(no description)
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: landslide.copy-theme
  • Default: false

debug:

(no description)
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: landslide.debug
  • Default: false

destination:

(no description)
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • User Property: landslide.destination
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/landslide/presentation.html

embed:

(no description)
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: landslide.embed
  • Default: false

encoding:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: landslide.encoding

extensions:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

lineos:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: landslide.lineos

presenterMode:

(no description)
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: landslide.presenter-mode
  • Default: false

quiet:

(no description)
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: landslide.quiet
  • Default: false

relative:

(no description)
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: landslide.relative
  • Default: false

source:

(no description)
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: landslide.source

theme:

(no description)
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • User Property: landslide.theme

watch:

(no description)
  • Type: int
  • Required: No
  • User Property: landslide.watch
  • Default: -1
